text.ascii: sUta uvAca
text.ur: sūta uvāca

text.ascii: athAvaraNamukhyAni nAnApraharaNAni ca
text.ur: athāvaraṇamukhyāni nānāpraharaṇāni ca

text.ascii: pragRhyAbhyadravan devAn sahitA daityadAnavAH
text.ur: pragr̥hyābhyadravan devān sahitā daityadānavāḥ

text.ascii: tatas tad amRtaM devo viSNur AdAya vIryavAn
text.ur: tatas tad amr̥taṁ devo viṣṇur ādāya vīryavān

text.ascii: jahAra dAnavendrebhyo nareNa sahitaH prabhuH
text.ur: jahāra dānavendrebhyo nareṇa sahitaḥ prabhuḥ

text.ascii: tato devagaNAH sarve papus tad amRtaM tadA
text.ur: tato devagaṇāḥ sarve papus tad amr̥taṁ tadā

text.ascii: viSNoH sakAzAt saMprApya saMbhrame tumule sati
text.ur: viṣṇoḥ sakāśāt saṁprāpya saṁbhrame tumule sati

text.ascii: tataH pibatsu tatkAlaM deveSv amRtam Ipsitam
text.ur: tataḥ pibatsu tatkālaṁ deveṣv amr̥tam īpsitam

text.ascii: rAhur vibudharUpeNa dAnavaH prApibat tadA
text.ur: rāhur vibudharūpeṇa dānavaḥ prāpibat tadā

text.ascii: tasya kaNTham anuprApte dAnavasyAmRte tadA
text.ur: tasya kaṇṭham anuprāpte dānavasyāmr̥te tadā

text.ascii: AkhyAtaM candrasUryAbhyAM surANAM hitakAmyayA
text.ur: ākhyātaṁ candrasūryābhyāṁ surāṇāṁ hitakāmyayā

text.ascii: tato bhagavatA tasya ziraz chinnam alaMkRtam
text.ur: tato bhagavatā tasya śiraś chinnam alaṁkr̥tam

text.ascii: cakrAyudhena cakreNa pibato 'mRtam ojasA
text.ur: cakrāyudhena cakreṇa pibato ’mr̥tam ojasā

text.ascii: tac chailazRGgapratimaM dAnavasya ziro mahat
text.ur: tac chailaśr̥ṅgapratimaṁ dānavasya śiro mahat

text.ascii: cakreNotkRttam apatac cAlayad vasudhAtalam
text.ur: cakreṇotkr̥ttam apatac cālayad vasudhātalam

text.ascii: tato vairavinirbandhaH kRto rAhumukhena vai
text.ur: tato vairavinirbandhaḥ kr̥to rāhumukhena vai

text.ascii: zAzvataz candrasUryAbhyAM grasaty adyApi caiva tau
text.ur: śāśvataś candrasūryābhyāṁ grasaty adyāpi caiva tau

text.ascii: vihAya bhagavAMz cApi strIrUpam atulaM hariH
text.ur: vihāya bhagavāṁś cāpi strīrūpam atulaṁ hariḥ

text.ascii: nAnApraharaNair bhImair dAnavAn samakampayat
text.ur: nānāpraharaṇair bhīmair dānavān samakampayat

text.ascii: tataH pravRttaH saMgrAmaH samIpe lavaNAmbhasaH
text.ur: tataḥ pravr̥ttaḥ saṁgrāmaḥ samīpe lavaṇāmbhasaḥ

text.ascii: surANAm asurANAM ca sarvaghorataro mahAn
text.ur: surāṇām asurāṇāṁ ca sarvaghorataro mahān

text.ascii: prAsAH suvipulAs tIkSNA nyapatanta sahasrazaH
text.ur: prāsāḥ suvipulās tīkṣṇā nyapatanta sahasraśaḥ

text.ascii: tomarAz ca sutIkSNAgrAH zastrANi vividhAni ca
text.ur: tomarāś ca sutīkṣṇāgrāḥ śastrāṇi vividhāni ca

text.ascii: tato 'surAz cakrabhinnA vamanto rudhiraM bahu
text.ur: tato ’surāś cakrabhinnā vamanto rudhiraṁ bahu

text.ascii: asizaktigadArugNA nipetur dharaNItale
text.ur: asiśaktigadārugṇā nipetur dharaṇītale

text.ascii: chinnAni paTTizaiz cApi zirAMsi yudhi dAruNe
text.ur: chinnāni paṭṭiśaiś cāpi śirāṁsi yudhi dāruṇe

text.ascii: taptakAJcanajAlAni nipetur anizaM tadA
text.ur: taptakāñcanajālāni nipetur aniśaṁ tadā

text.ascii: rudhireNAvaliptAGgA nihatAz ca mahAsurAH
text.ur: rudhireṇāvaliptāṅgā nihatāś ca mahāsurāḥ

text.ascii: adrINAm iva kUTAni dhAturaktAni zerate
text.ur: adrīṇām iva kūṭāni dhāturaktāni śerate

text.ascii: hAhAkAraH samabhavat tatra tatra sahasrazaH
text.ur: hāhākāraḥ samabhavat tatra tatra sahasraśaḥ

text.ascii: anyonyaM chindatAM zastrair Aditye lohitAyati
text.ur: anyonyaṁ chindatāṁ śastrair āditye lohitāyati

text.ascii: parighaiz cAyasaiH pItaiH saMnikarSe ca muSTibhiH
text.ur: parighaiś cāyasaiḥ pītaiḥ saṁnikarṣe ca muṣṭibhiḥ

text.ascii: nighnatAM samare 'nyonyaM zabdo divam ivAspRzat
text.ur: nighnatāṁ samare ’nyonyaṁ śabdo divam ivāspr̥śat

text.ascii: chindhi bhindhi pradhAvadhvaM pAtayAbhisareti ca
text.ur: chindhi bhindhi pradhāvadhvaṁ pātayābhisareti ca

text.ascii: vyazrUyanta mahAghorAH zabdAs tatra samantataH
text.ur: vyaśrūyanta mahāghorāḥ śabdās tatra samantataḥ

text.ascii: evaM sutumule yuddhe vartamAne bhayAvahe
text.ur: evaṁ sutumule yuddhe vartamāne bhayāvahe

text.ascii: naranArAyaNau devau samAjagmatur Ahavam
text.ur: naranārāyaṇau devau samājagmatur āhavam

text.ascii: tatra divyaM dhanur dRSTvA narasya bhagavAn api
text.ur: tatra divyaṁ dhanur dr̥ṣṭvā narasya bhagavān api

text.ascii: cintayAm Asa vai cakraM viSNur dAnavasUdanam
text.ur: cintayām āsa vai cakraṁ viṣṇur dānavasūdanam

text.ascii: tato 'mbarAc cintitamAtram AgataM; mahAprabhaM cakram amitratApanam
text.ur: tato ’mbarāc cintitamātram āgataṁ; mahāprabhaṁ cakram amitratāpanam

text.ascii: vibhAvasos tulyam akuNThamaNDalaM; sudarzanaM bhImam ajayyam uttamam
text.ur: vibhāvasos tulyam akuṇṭhamaṇḍalaṁ; sudarśanaṁ bhīmam ajayyam uttamam

text.ascii: tad AgataM jvalitahutAzanaprabhaM; bhayaMkaraM karikarabAhur acyutaH
text.ur: tad āgataṁ jvalitahutāśanaprabhaṁ; bhayaṁkaraṁ karikarabāhur acyutaḥ

text.ascii: mumoca vai capalam udagravegavan; mahAprabhaM paranagarAvadAraNam
text.ur: mumoca vai capalam udagravegavan; mahāprabhaṁ paranagarāvadāraṇam

text.ascii: tad antakajvalanasamAnavarcasaM; punaH punar nyapatata vegavat tadA
text.ur: tad antakajvalanasamānavarcasaṁ; punaḥ punar nyapatata vegavat tadā

text.ascii: vidArayad ditidanujAn sahasrazaH; kareritaM puruSavareNa saMyuge
text.ur: vidārayad ditidanujān sahasraśaḥ; kareritaṁ puruṣavareṇa saṁyuge

text.ascii: dahat kva cij jvalana ivAvalelihat; prasahya tAn asuragaNAn nyakRntata
text.ur: dahat kva cij jvalana ivāvalelihat; prasahya tān asuragaṇān nyakr̥ntata

text.ascii: praveritaM viyati muhuH kSitau tadA; papau raNe rudhiram atho pizAcavat
text.ud: प्रवेरितं वियति मुहुः क्षितौ तदा; पपौ रणे रुधिरमथो पिशाचवत्
text.ur: praveritaṁ viyati muhuḥ kṣitau tadā; papau raṇe rudhiram atho piśācavat

text.ascii: athAsurA giribhir adInacetaso; muhur muhuH suragaNam ardayaMs tadA
text.ur: athāsurā giribhir adīnacetaso; muhur muhuḥ suragaṇam ardayaṁs tadā

text.ascii: mahAbalA vigalitameghavarcasaH; sahasrazo gaganam abhiprapadya ha
text.ur: mahābalā vigalitameghavarcasaḥ; sahasraśo gaganam abhiprapadya ha

text.ascii: athAmbarAd bhayajananAH prapedire; sapAdapA bahuvidhamegharUpiNaH
text.ur: athāmbarād bhayajananāḥ prapedire; sapādapā bahuvidhamegharūpiṇaḥ

text.ascii: mahAdrayaH pravigalitAgrasAnavaH; parasparaM drutam abhihatya sasvanAH
text.ur: mahādrayaḥ pravigalitāgrasānavaḥ; parasparaṁ drutam abhihatya sasvanāḥ

text.ascii: tato mahI pravicalitA sakAnanA; mahAdripAtAbhihatA samantataH
text.ud: ततो मही प्रविचलिता सकानना; महाद्रिपाताभिहता समन्ततः
text.ur: tato mahī pravicalitā sakānanā; mahādripātābhihatā samantataḥ

text.ascii: parasparaM bhRzam abhigarjatAM muhU; raNAjire bhRzam abhisaMpravartite
text.ur: parasparaṁ bhr̥śam abhigarjatāṁ muhū; raṇājire bhr̥śam abhisaṁpravartite

text.ascii: naras tato varakanakAgrabhUSaNair; maheSubhir gaganapathaM samAvRNot
text.ur: naras tato varakanakāgrabhūṣaṇair; maheṣubhir gaganapathaṁ samāvr̥ṇot

text.ascii: vidArayan girizikharANi patribhir; mahAbhaye 'suragaNavigrahe tadA
text.ur: vidārayan giriśikharāṇi patribhir; mahābhaye ’suragaṇavigrahe tadā

text.ascii: tato mahIM lavaNajalaM ca sAgaraM; mahAsurAH pravivizur arditAH suraiH
text.ud: ततो महीं लवणजलं च सागरं; महासुराः प्रविविशुरर्दिताः सुरैः
text.ur: tato mahīṁ lavaṇajalaṁ ca sāgaraṁ; mahāsurāḥ praviviśur arditāḥ suraiḥ

text.ascii: viyadgataM jvalitahutAzanaprabhaM; sudarzanaM parikupitaM nizAmya ca
text.ud: वियद्गतं ज्वलितहुताशनप्रभं; सुदर्शनं परिकुपितं निशाम्य च
text.ur: viyadgataṁ jvalitahutāśanaprabhaṁ; sudarśanaṁ parikupitaṁ niśāmya ca

text.ascii: tataH surair vijayam avApya mandaraH; svam eva dezaM gamitaH supUjitaH
text.ud: ततः सुरैर्विजयमवाप्य मन्दरः; स्वमेव देशं गमितः सुपूजितः
text.ur: tataḥ surair vijayam avāpya mandaraḥ; svam eva deśaṁ gamitaḥ supūjitaḥ

text.ascii: vinAdya khaM divam api caiva sarvazas; tato gatAH saliladharA yathAgatam
text.ud: विनाद्य खं दिवमपि चैव सर्वश;स्ततो गताः सलिलधरा यथागतम्
text.ur: vinādya khaṁ divam api caiva sarvaśas; tato gatāḥ saliladharā yathāgatam

text.ascii: tato 'mRtaM sunihitam eva cakrire; surAH parAM mudam abhigamya puSkalAm
text.ud: ततोऽमृतं सुनिहितमेव चक्रिरे; सुराः परां मुदमभिगम्य पुष्कलाम्
text.ur: tato ’mr̥taṁ sunihitam eva cakrire; surāḥ parāṁ mudam abhigamya puṣkalām

text.ascii: dadau ca taM nidhim amRtasya rakSituM; kirITine balabhid athAmaraiH saha
text.ud: ददौ च तं निधिममृतस्य रक्षितुं; किरीटिने बलभिदथामरैः सह
text.ur: dadau ca taṁ nidhim amr̥tasya rakṣituṁ; kirīṭine balabhid athāmaraiḥ saha
